attributes.action: Return all illegal immigrants crossing the channel back to France
attributes.additional_details: Return all illegal immigrants back to France if they cross the channel and stop UK Border Force acting like their personal taxi service
attributes.background: illegal migrant crossings this year have skyrocketed. Only 6 percent of immigrants brought over by the taxi service that is UK Border Force have been returned to France. The situation is a disgrace

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
